meanings.sent1: She carefully delineated the details of the painting.
meanings.sent2: The map delineates the boundaries of the city.
meanings.sent3: He tried to delineate his messy room but got confused.
meanings.sent4: Her words delineated a path to success for the team.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colors to delineate the different parts of the diagram.

meanings.sent1: The artist delineated the shape of the tree with a pencil.
meanings.sent2: Please delineate the area where the new building will be constructed.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to delineate its territory by scratching the fence.
meanings.sent4: The stars delineated a beautiful pattern in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The architect used a ruler to delineate the edges of the blueprint.

meanings.sent1: The rules clearly delineate the expectations for behavior.
meanings.sent2: Can you delineate the steps needed to complete the project?
meanings.sent3: The comedian tried to delineate the difference between cats and dogs.
meanings.sent4: His speech delineated the importance of teamwork in achieving goals.
meanings.sent5: The recipe meticulously delineates the ingredients and cooking time.
